featured.text: Despite their great 28 , however, most domesticated apples can be traced back to a common ancestor, the wild apple of Central Asia, Malus sieversii.

definition.zh_def: 經過馴化的，通常指動物被人類飼養和培育以適應家庭或農業生活。
definition.en_def: Tamed and adapted for living with humans, typically referring to animals that are raised for companionship or agricultural purposes.
definition.example: Dogs are domesticated animals that have been bred to live alongside humans.
